title: Registrar Contact Form | UIC Office of the Registrar
text: Please note: E-mails are reviewed during normal business hours and   most likely there will be lag time in our response.  If you are in need   of assistance in the moment, browse the links at Current and Former   Students at the Admissions website, use the search box above, or call   the Registration Helpline at (312) 996-8600, TDD users call (312)   355-0380, Monday through Friday, 8:30 am to 5:00 pm, central time.
Please scroll up and choose a records department you would like to send your message to.
If you have a specific question and need to speak with a Registration Officer, please call (312) 996-8600. TDD users call (312) 355-0380.
